sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"react-pixijs"}}>{`React PixiJS`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://img.shields.io/badge/tested_with-jest-green.svg","alt":null}}></MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://circleci.com/gh/inlet/react-pixi-fiber"}}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"src":"https://img.shields.io/circleci/project/github/inlet/react-pixi/master.svg","alt":"CircleCI"}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-green.svg","alt":null}}></MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://img.shields.io/badge/code_style-prettier-blue.svg","alt":null}}></MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://img.shields.io/badge/react-v16.6+-ff69b4.svg","alt":null}}></MDXTag>{` `}<MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://img.shields.io/badge/pixi-v4+-ff69b4.svg","alt":null}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Write `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://www.pixijs.com/"}}>{`PixiJS`}</MDXTag>{` applications using React declarative style.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="img" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"src":"https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/232559/37669267-b46a8f8e-2c66-11e8-96e7-cae2ae6bdd7d.png","alt":null}}></MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Collaborate on Github: `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://github.com/inlet/react-pixi"}}>{`https://github.com/inlet/react-pixi`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"install"}}>{`Install`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"node"}}>{`Node`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-npm","metaString":""}}>{`npm install @inlet/react-pixi --save
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"browser"}}>{`Browser`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-html","metaString":""}}>{`<script src="https://unpkg.com/@inlet/react-pixi@latest/dist/react-pixi.umd.js"></script>
<script>
  // window.ReactPixi
</script>
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"usage"}}>{`Usage`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"with-react-dom"}}>{`With React-DOM`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`Stage`}</MDXTag>{` renders a canvas element. All child components are rendered on the canvas.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-jsx","metaString":""}}>{`import { Stage, Sprite } from '@inlet/react-pixi'

const App = () => (
  <Stage>
    <Sprite image="./bunny.png" x={100} y={100} />
  </Stage>
)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h4" components={components} props={{"id":"without-react-dom"}}>{`Without React-DOM`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-jsx","metaString":""}}>{`import { render, Text } from '@inlet/react-pixi'
import * as PIXI from 'pixi.js'

// init PIXI.Application manually
const app = new PIXI.Application(800, 600, {
  backgroundColor: 0x10bb99,
  view: document.getElementById('container')
})

// Use the custom renderer to render a valid PIXI object into a PIXI container.
render(<Text text="Hello World" x={200} y={200} />, app.stage)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"examples"}}>{`Examples`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Watch the `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"https://codepen.io/collection/XPpGdb"}}>{`collection on codepen`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://codepen.io/inlet/pen/zWEaoR"}}>{`Text`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://codepen.io/inlet/pen/aYLvrZ"}}>{`Sprite - Rotating Bunny`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://codepen.io/inlet/pen/rdGvQj"}}>{`Tiling Sprite`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://codepen.io/inlet/pen/vRejPV"}}>{`Graphics`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://codepen.io/inlet/pen/NYazPq"}}>{`Interaction - Click`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://codepen.io/inlet/pen/RMLWxV"}}>{`Rope`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://codepen.io/inlet/pen/RMLJKm"}}>{`Custom Components`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://codepen.io/inlet/pen/JLrBqK"}}>{`NineSlicePlane`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://codepen.io/inlet/pen/PRJdgg"}}>{`Custom Render - Without Stage`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"custom-components"}}>{`Custom Components`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Currently the following Components are implemented by default:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.Container.html"}}>{`Container`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.particles.ParticleContainer.html"}}>{`ParticleContainer`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.Sprite.html"}}>{`Sprite`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.extras.TilingSprite.html"}}>{`TilingSprite`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.Graphics.html"}}>{`Graphics`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.mesh.Mesh.html"}}>{`Mesh`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.mesh.Rope.html"}}>{`Rope`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.Text.html"}}>{`Text`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.extras.BitmapText.html"}}>{`BitmapText`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul"><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.mesh.NineSlicePlane.html"}}>{`NineSlicePlane`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can easily add new components to your project:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-jsx","metaString":""}}>{`// ./components/Rectangle.js

import * as PIXI from 'pixi.js'
import { PixiComponent } from '@inlet/react-pixi'

export default PixiComponent('Rectangle', {
  create: props => {
    return new PIXI.Graphics()
  },
  didMount: (instance, parent) => {
    // apply custom logic on mount
  },
  willUnmount: (instance, parent) => {
    // clean up before removal
  },
  applyProps: (instance, oldProps, newProps) => {
    const { fill, x, y, width, height } = newProps
    instance.clear()
    instance.beginFill(fill)
    instance.drawRect(x, y, width, height)
    instance.endFill()
  }
})
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-jsx","metaString":""}}>{`// App.js

import { Stage } from '@inlet/react-pixi'
import Rectangle from './components/Rectangle'
export default () => (
  <Stage>
    <Rectangle x={100} 
               y={100} 
               width={500} 
               heigth={300} 
               fill={0xff0000} />
  </Stage>
)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"access-pixi-application"}}>{`Access PIXI Application`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Accessing the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`PIXI.Application`}</MDXTag>{` instance in your child components.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"via-render-props-function-as-child"}}>{`Via Render Props (function as child)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-jsx","metaString":""}}>{`// App.js

import { Stage, Container, AppConsumer } from '@inlet/react-pixi'
import { RotatingBunny } from './components/RotatingBunny'

export default () => (
  <Stage>
    <Container>
      <AppConsumer>
        {app => <RotatingBunny app={app} />}
      </AppConsumer>
    </Container>
  </Stage>
)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"via-higher-order-component-withpixiapp"}}>{`Via Higher Order Component `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="h3">{`withPixiApp`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-jsx","metaString":""}}>{`// App.js

import { Stage, Container, withPixiApp } from '@inlet/react-pixi'
import { RotatingBunny } from './components/RotatingBunny'

const BunnyWithApp = withPixiApp(RotatingBunny)

export default () => (
  <Stage>
    <Container>
      <BunnyWithApp />
    </Container>
  </Stage>
)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`For the sake of completeness, the `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`RotatingBunny`}</MDXTag>{` component could look something like this:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-jsx","metaString":""}}>{`// ./components/RotatingBunny.js

import { Sprite } from '@inlet/react-pixi'

class RotatingBunny extends React.Component {

  state = { rotation: 0 }

  componentDidMount() {
    // listen to tick events (raf)
    this.props.app.ticker.add(this.tick)
  }
  
  componentWillUnmount() {
    // stop listening for tick events
    this.props.app.ticker.remove(this.tick)
  }
  
  tick = (delta) => {
      // rotate this sucker 🙌
      this.setState(({ rotation }) => ({
          rotation: rotation + 0.1 * delta
      }))
  };
  
  render() {
    return <Sprite image="./bunny.png" rotation={this.state.rotation} />
  }
}
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"stage"}}>{`Stage`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Renders a `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`PIXI.Application`}</MDXTag>{` in a prebuilt React component using React-DOM.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`See `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"/#usage"}}>{`Usage`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Example:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-jsx","metaString":""}}>{`import { render } from 'react-dom'
import { Stage, Container } from '@inlet/react-pixi'

const App = () => (
  <Stage width={500} height={400} options={{ backgroundColor: 0xff0000 }}>
    <Container></Container>
  </Stage>
)

render(<App />, document.getElementById('root'))
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="table" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="thead" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="thead">
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Prop`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Description`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="th" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`Default value`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tbody" components={components} parentName="table">
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`width`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`the width of the renderers view`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`800`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`height`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`the height of the renderers view`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`800`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`onMount`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`callback function for the created app instance`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`onUnMount`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`callback function when the Stage gets unmounted`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`raf`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`use the internal PIXI ticker (requestAnimationFrame)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`true`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`renderOnComponentChange`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`render stage on Stage changes? only useful in combination with `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`raf`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`true`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="tr" components={components} parentName="tbody">
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="td">{`options`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}>{`see `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="td" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/release/docs/PIXI.Application.html"}}>{`PIXI.Application options`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="td" components={components} parentName="tr" props={{"align":null}}></MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The Stage stores the created `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`PIXI.Application`}</MDXTag>{` instance to context, which can be accessed using a `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"/#access-pixi-application"}}>{`Provider or a Higher
Order Component`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"components"}}>{`Components`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Pass down PIXI options as props. Reference the `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/index.html"}}>{`PIXI documentation`}</MDXTag>{` to see what properties can be applied.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`For example The Sprite can have `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.Sprite.html#x"}}>{`x`}</MDXTag>{` and `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/dev/docs/PIXI.Sprite.html#x"}}>{`y`}</MDXTag>{` values as writable members:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-jsx","metaString":""}}>{`import { Sprite } from '@inlet/pixi-react'

const MyComponent = () => (
  <Sprite image=".image.png" x={100} y={200} />
)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The `}<MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="p">{`image`}</MDXTag>{` prop here is shorthand for `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://pixijs.download/release/docs/PIXI.Sprite.html#.fromImage"}}><MDXTag name="inlineCode" components={components} parentName="a">{`PIXI.Sprite.fromImage()`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="pre" components={components}><MDXTag name="code" components={components} parentName="pre" props={{"className":"language-jsx","metaString":""}}>{`import { Sprite } from '@inlet/pixi-react'

const texture = new PIXI.Sprite.fromImage('./image.png')

const MyComponent = () => (
  <Sprite texture={texture} x={100} y={200} />
)
`}</MDXTag></MDXTag></MDXTag>
